publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-893.1 Nicola Sturgeon: Mike Tysonâ€”As an amendment to motion (S1M-893) in the name of Mrs Mary Mulligan, insert at end "and calls upon the Scottish Executive to ensure by whatever means possible and, if necessary, by arranging for a judicial review to be sought, that the boxing match scheduled for 24 June 2000 at Hampden Stadium does not go ahead."
